storyInfo: Gavial and Eunectes, both at Rhodes Island, receive a letter left behind by Tomimi, who is back home on vacation. Supposedly, a Durin from underground brought news that the entire rainforest could be in danger.

attributes.text: What are we doing, you ask? Hah, what else can we warriors of Acahualla do?
The greatest weapons, the sturdiest buildings. With the High Priest and Inam Committee's support, we can build even more machines!
Conquest! 'Manure factory!' The Acahualla name will ring across all the lands!

attributes.content: 'Manure factory.' What a great word... That's how you say it, right, Yogi?
attributes.name: Agitated Archosauria

attributes.content: No, Yota, it's 'manufacturing.' Besides, you should try to get some more rest instead of helping out with work on the... uh... 'Forest Mk. III,' the fully-automatic tree planting and cutting robot.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Actually, since we wrote it off and built a new one last night, this is 'Mk. IV.'
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: I've been doing great lately, don't worry. I never thought these rocks... Uh, the Originium could be so useful. My eyes are wide open now! Is this new technology? Who brought it here?
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Probably Inam.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Ah... It's strong like Gavial, and you can shoot the upper half up in a spiral. It even stays midair for half a minute.
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Yeah, it's pretty shocking. Though the High Priest calls that 'disassembly.'
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: I've been thinking for a while... Look, the lands beyond are so vast, and now we have so much... 'Manufactoring.'
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Manufacturing. And the High Priest said before that's not how you use the word.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: That doesn't matter. What matters is that we'll have more and more big machines! They'll also get easier to control and cause less accidents, too!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: There's much more we can do now, isn't there?!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Like what?
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Be ambitious, Brother. Set your sights on all of Sargon. Can you see it now—
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Uh, uhh...
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: —Our statues! As tall as three mountains and as big as two whole lakes!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Ooohh—!
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Of course, we need one for the clan leader too... and the High Priest! We can't forget Inam, either...
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Finally, we need something special to celebrate all this... A building! Right! A palace! Let's see... with wood? No, it has to be sandstone or some sturdier rock... Let's use Originium! That's it!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: We'll pile the Originium up to make a huge building!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Pile it up? I-Into what? Like a temple?
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Maybe something simpler. Like a circle... Hm, you can't make a circle with rocks. Let's pile it up layer by layer so it looks like a triangle from all directions!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Oh... Ohh! A triangular tower! Now we just need to give it a name!
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Still... there's no point in talking about all this. Gavial said I won't live that long with my disease.
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Yota... No! We just have to change the way we think. Let's turn this palace into your burial plot.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: That way, forget Acahualla, all of Sargon will remember your name. And I know what to call it, too! 'Yogi Yota Tower!' We'll finish it before you die!
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Yogi...!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Don't jinx yourselves like that...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, Tomimi... What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: I thought you went straight to Gavial and the clan leader yesterday.
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: It's been a while since I was back home. I can't just leave like that, can I?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I guess not. So, what are you doing here today? You already stopped by, didn't you?
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Actually...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, you're the shortie Inam mentioned. What's the matter? Are you here to complain about our food again? Yeah, I've been thinking the food's been kind of bland lately too. How are we supposed to get by without meat?
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: No, it's something else. And I have a name. Stitch Canvas. You can't judge me by my height. Are all Archosauria like this?
attributes.name: Scathing Durin

attributes.content: Haha, no, we're not...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Whatever. You're a bunch of weirdos bickering about tail thickness anyway... I guess it's a cultural difference that I'll have to respect.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Huh? Huh...?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Alright, so what do you need? We're working on a magnificent 'bluepint' for Sargon.
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Blueprint.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Uh, right. Blueprint. You hear that, Durin man? This is a huge, glorious plan!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: I kind of think... a big, over-the-top tomb isn't a such a great plan... Besides, if everyone gets a huge tomb like that, we won't have enough room in the rainforest.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Stop calling it a tomb. It's for celebration! It's celebratory!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: If we build it bigger, we can put both the leader and Gavial in there too, and our descendants will sing the praises of Zumama and 'Gavial's Will' in front of our statues, with their kids all around them.
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: (I am starting to regret this decision...)
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Wha...! B-But...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Right. Right now, we shouldn't—
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: —In that case, we can't call it the 'Yogi Yota Tower!' It has to have Gavial's name in it! W-We can add my name in there too, while we're at it...!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Uh, no, I mean... Well, Mr. Stitch already talked to Inam about this, but I want everyone to hear him explain it.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: This is pretty serious, after all. I sent Gavial a letter too, but I don't know if they'll make it in time...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Serious? What's so serious? I'm trying to plan out the rest of my life with what little time I have left! What could be more serious than that?
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: *cough*... I'm not here to judge your fantastical ideas, surface dwellers. However...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Just as I said before, if our city actually meets this crisis, the calamity will destroy everything.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And when that happens, it won't matter how amazing your buildings are. They'll be reduced to rubble.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Hey, Zumama.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial? I didn't know we came back at the same time.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: How's the situation? Have those Infected settled down?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Who do you think you're talking to? Not just the Infected. Mine security, the villagers nearby, and that old man from Rim Billiton. I took care of all of them.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Old man...? You dealt with our business partner, too?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yeah, I've got a problem with the way he treats the Infected. I had to have a friendly chat with him, as a doctor. 'From a doctor's perspective and the Gavial way.'
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Never mind all that. Have you seen the letter yet?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I haven't been back to the dorms... It's a letter from Tomimi? She went back home to visit her family, didn't she?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yeah, and she's been keeping in touch with her Acahualla friends through Inam.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Looked like she was going to ask us to go with her, too.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: A trip home together... If only Master Closure hadn't given me any work. That would've been nice.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But if that was the whole story, you wouldn't have bothered to come looking for me, right?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hey now, when did we become strangers?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Never mind... So, what did Inam say? Did Tomimi run into trouble?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yeah, more accurately, the whole rainforest's in trouble.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Better pack up and get yourself ready. We're in for a big adventure.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: T-The whole rainforest will sink into the earth?! The entire land will shift and change?!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I could explain the structure of a Durin city, but it's not like you would understand. To put it simply, my homeland is under the ground not far from this rainforest.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: We've run into some trouble... and that's why I came up here to seek the surface-dwellers' help.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Now, I didn't actually have very high hopes for you lot to begin with, but I saw what you've been doing. Perhaps you can be of some help.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Well, that does sound like a big problem... but that doesn't have much to do with our tribe, right?
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Wait, this guy said if the Durin city's destroyed, it'll cause a chain reaction that will affect the surface... and our Yota Yogi Tower will...
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: On the flipside, if you help us, we'll return the favor with our Durin technology.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I don't know a lot about your tech level... but I can tell at a glance that your kind can sometimes be outrageously primitive.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Help? From an outsider? Now I'm not so sure we could use any...
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Ugh, to me, it's you surface-dwellers who are the outsiders... Never mind.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But Mr. Stitch did point out some serious problems with the 'Forest Mk. III' when he looked at it... although it kinda seems like he got rid of a lot of its functions...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: This guy did?!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Yep, that's why Inam figured we should follow Mr. Stitch underground to see what's going on. I-I'm going too, of course, as the clan leader of 'Gavial's Will.'
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: And while we're gone, it's up to you guys to take care of everyone in Tiacauh.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Well, I've got problem with that... I mean, for the sake of our Yo... No, our 'Great Gold Originium Pearl Triangular Tower of Great Acahualla,' you better get this problem solved!
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: You used the word 'great' twice...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: We will.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: But how are you going to get there...? We haven't been outside the forest too much. Are you sure you won't get lost?
attributes.name: Yota

attributes.content: Don't you worry!
After all, I am coming along.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Mr. E-Elysium!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: You're the Rhodes Islander...
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Resilient as I am, even I have to take a vacation to alleviate the stress I've accumulated. Little did I know I'd find myself in another tremendous operation to save the Durins... But never mind. Who am I to miss out on more fun?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Dylan and Blaze were right. It's a bustling place, but you can still relax and wind down a little. A wonderful little spot.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I still have yet to find those famously delicious mushrooms after searching through the woods multiple times, though...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I only hope that Miss Inam will follow through on her promise to help me accomplish the 'seven must-dos when visiting Acahualla.'
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Mr. Elysium and Mr. Stitch have already gotten the ball rolling. With the two of them as guides, we won't ever lose our way... or at least that's what they promised.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Haha, perhaps by the time Gavial and Eunectes make it home, we will have already taken care of everything.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: She used to be the impatient one... How come I have to wait half an hour in the hallway for her now?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Look at this new gear... I thought Gavial would file a request for this stuff every month, but I guess that wasn't really the case, judging by Master Closure's reaction.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: So I guess she's not going back to playing 'wandering medic who left the tribe'?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: This is taking way too long! Gavial, what are you doing?!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Don't rush me! You guys put together the most complicated equipment, you know?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: This is what you get when you make an order on such short notice! If you have a problem with that, maybe you should go through proper procedures with Engineering next time.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Ugh—! This sucks! Not even those knights in Kazimierz wear this much armor!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Doesn't matter, if there's anything you can't figure out—
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Forget it! This will do! I'm tossing the rest!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yeah, forget all that junk. Don't need it. The moment I picked up this axe, I figured it all out.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Figured what out...?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: That this guy's all I need.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Did you make it?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It was a rush order.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I knew it. Only you could make something this kick-ass. No complaints. From the balance to the weight, all perfect.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But this little ornament...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Lancet-2 told me to pour my feelings into everything I contribute to, whether a patient or equipment.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: She said that, huh? Probably learned it from Closure. Well, whatever winds your sprocket.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Alright then, let's go!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...Gavial!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: What now, more dawdling?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What... are you going to do? It sounds like the Durins' call for help that Tomimi got might be some kind of crisis their city is facing.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: It might be a Catastrophe... It might be war.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: The letter says 'fire rained down from the sky and burned our quilts' and 'a giant mushroom sprouted from the ground and blocked the sunlight, preventing the plants from growing,' but it's all too abstract.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No matter what the problem is, we oughta be able to tackle it. I mean, Inam and Elysium are coming too.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Tackle it how?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Didn't you just give me the answer? Check out my getup. I really mean it, Zumama. I haven't been this excited in a while.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So you mean you're using your fists again.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hah, the usual!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: The usual, huh...
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Time waits for no one, Zumama.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Don't you want to see with your own eyes what those guys from your tribe have done to the forest?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hah... I guess so.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Let's get going, then.
attributes.name: Eunectes
